name: tragedy-commons-web-game
description: WebAssembly game for Tragedy of the Commons AI

scripts.build: python -m pip install pygbag && python -m pygbag --build main.py
scripts.build:check: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); const buildPath = path.join(__dirname, 'build', 'web', 'index.html'); if (!fs.existsSync(buildPath)) { console.error('Build not found! Run npm run build first.'); process.exit(1); } else { console.log('Build found at:', buildPath); }"
